name: crafting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity or hobby of making decorative objects with your hands: I enjoy crafting, especially quilting.
the activity of skilfully creating something such as a story: So much care went into the crafting of the narrative.
More examplesFewer examplesShe saves fabric scraps and old buttons and uses them for crafting.The foundation teaches skills and vocations such as fashion design and furniture crafting. I love crafting, cooking, and entertaining. The speech he made was very much of his own crafting.Accepting praise for the screenplay, he acknowledged his co-writer's role in its crafting.He said his proudest achievement as a councilman was the successful crafting of a $42 million bailout of the public school system.
